methods.name: ofSoundStreamClose
methods.short: Stops the sound stream and also cleans up the stream's resources
Prints a list of all available audio devices \return all sound devices found on the system

methods.name: ofSoundStreamStart
methods.short: Starts the sound stream (audioIn() / audioOut() will start being called)

methods.name: ofSoundStreamStop
methods.short: Stops the sound stream (audioIn() / audioOut() will stop being called)
